files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IAIInstructionProvider
files.Summary: Provides system instructions for the AI chat client.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IAIToolsProvider
files.Summary: Provides custom AI tools that can be used by the chat client.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IActionWidgetActionHandler<TWidgetAction, T>
files.Summary: Handles a specific widget action with type-safe payload processing.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IChatHistorySummarizer
files.Summary: Defines the contract for summarizing chat conversation history.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IRecyclableWidget
files.Summary: Interface for widgets that need to perform cleanup or resource deallocation.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IStreamPayloadValidator
files.Summary: Defines validation criteria for SSE stream payloads to prevent Denial-of-Service (DoS) attacks. Implementations must validate payload size, frequency, and content to ensure fair resource usage.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IThreadPersonaStore
files.Summary: Stores per-thread AI persona overrides.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IThreadService
files.Summary: Defines the contract for managing conversation threads and message history.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetAction<T>
files.Summary: Represents a widget action with a typed payload.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetActionHandlerResolver
files.Summary: Handler registry for managing action handler resolution.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetActionMetadata
files.Summary: Metadata for a widget action.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetActionRegistry
files.Summary: Registry for managing widget actions and their handlers.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetHintParser
files.Summary: Defines the contract for parsing widget hints from raw AI model output.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetHintSanitizer
files.Summary: Defines the contract for sanitizing content containing incomplete or malformed widget markup.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetLocalizer
files.Summary: Provides localization support for widget text and labels.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetRegistry
files.Summary: Central registry for widget instances and their tools.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetSseService
files.Summary: Service for managing Server-Sent Events (SSE) for widget updates.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.IWidgetToolsProvider
files.Summary: Defines the contract for providing AI tool definitions for all available widget types.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.PayloadValidationException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when a payload fails validation.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.PayloadValidationReason
files.Summary: Specifies the reason a payload failed validation.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.PublishRateLimitExceededException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when a publisher exceeds the allowed publish rate.

files.Title: BbQ.ChatWidgets.Abstractions.StreamValidationRules
files.Summary: Defines validation rules for a specific stream to prevent DoS attacks.

files.Summary: Displays a collection of images (gallery).

files.Summary: An image item for use inside an .
